comments: a(n)=-A053123(n,5), n >= 5; a(n) := 0, n=0..4 (sixth column of shifted Chebyshev's S-triangle, decreasing order)
references: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, 1964 (and various reprintings).
